alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 31 at 1:51PM MDT until November 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 65 MPH possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Arlington and Elk Mountain along Interstate 80 between Laramie and Rawlins. * WHEN...High Wind Warning from Midnight MDT tonight until Noon MDT Wednesday. High Wind Watch from Late Wednesday night through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
